attribs.name: import_data
attribs.current:
{"npc_data":{"character_name":"Bagiennik","size":"Medium","type":"Aberration","alignment":"chaotic neutral","ac_srd":"15 (natural armor)","hp_srd":"75 (10d8 + 30)","npc_speed":"30 ft., swim 40 ft.","strength":16,"dexterity":18,"constitution":16,"intelligence":9,"wisdom":16,"charisma":11,"skills_srd":"Perception +5","senses":"darkvision 60 ft.","languages":"Common","challenge":"3","is_npc":1,"edit_mode":0,"content_srd":"
 Traits
**Healing Oil**: A bagiennik can automatically stabilize a dying creature by using an action to smear some of its oily secretion on the dying creature's flesh. A similar application on an already-stable creature or one with 1 or more hit points acts as a potion of healing, restoring 2d4 + 2 hit points. Alternatively, the bagiennik's secretion can have the effect of a lesser restoration spell. However, any creature receiving a bagiennik's Healing Oil must make a successful DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be slowed for 1 minute.

 Actions
**Multiattack**: The bagiennik makes two claw attacks.
**Claw**: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.
**Acid Spray**: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 15 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) acid damage. The target must make a successful DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone in the slick oil, which covers an area 5 feet square. A creature that enters the oily area or ends its turn there must also make the Dexterity saving throw to avoid falling prone. A creature needs to make only one saving throw per 5-foot-square per turn, even if it enters and ends its turn in the area. The slippery effect lasts for 3 rounds."}}

attribs.name: repeating_action_-KhTjftKjEnc-8AZNok6_content
attribs.current: The target must make a successful DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone in the slick oil, which covers an area 5 feet square. A creature that enters the oily area or ends its turn there must also make the Dexterity saving throw to avoid falling prone. A creature needs to make only one saving throw per 5-foot-square per turn, even if it enters and ends its turn in the area. The slippery effect lasts for 3 rounds.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KhTjftKjEnc-8AZNok7_content
attribs.current: A bagiennik can automatically stabilize a dying creature by using an action to smear some of its oily secretion on the dying creature's flesh. A similar application on an already-stable creature or one with 1 or more hit points acts as a potion of healing, restoring 2d4 + 2 hit points. Alternatively, the bagiennik's secretion can have the effect of a lesser restoration spell. However, any creature receiving a bagiennik's Healing Oil must make a successful DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be slowed for 1 minute.
